items.name: Ukunda Safari Circus
items.short_description: Experience the magic under the big top with acrobats, clowns, and daring acts inspired by local wildlife.
items.address: Diani Beach Road, next to Ukunda Airport, Ukunda

items.name: Diani Beach Puppetry
items.short_description: Traditional and modern puppet shows telling captivating stories from Kenyan folklore for young audiences.
items.address: Off Diani Beach Road, near Nomads, Ukunda

items.name: Coastal Kids Marionettes
items.short_description: Interactive marionette performances, allowing children to learn about coastal culture through playful characters.
items.address: Galu Kinondo Road, Ukunda

items.name: Jambo Tent Circus
items.short_description: A vibrant community circus offering workshops and performances, showcasing local talent and global acts.
items.address: Ukunda-Lungalunga Road, near Ukunda CBD, Ukunda

items.name: Ukunda Mystery Magic
items.short_description: A thrilling magic show filled with mind-bending illusions and dazzling tricks that will amaze the whole family.
items.address: Diani Beach Road, Baharini Plaza, Ukunda

items.name: Coastal Wonders Illusionist
items.short_description: Witness the impossible as our illusionist blends magic with coastal tales, creating an unforgettable experience.
items.address: Galu Kinondo Road, near The Sands, Ukunda

items.name: Safari Spellbound Show
items.short_description: A magical journey incorporating African safari themes, where animals appear and disappear before your eyes.
items.address: Ukunda Town Center, near Equity Bank, Ukunda

items.name: Diani Dreamweaver Magic
items.short_description: Interactive magic tricks and storytelling designed to inspire wonder and imagination in young children.
items.address: Off Ukunda-Lungalunga Road, near Leisure Lodge, Ukunda

items.name: Ukunda Animal Farm
items.short_description: A hands-on experience for children to interact with friendly farm animals, learn about farming, and enjoy fresh produce.
items.address: Ukunda-Lungalunga Road, 5km from Ukunda Airport, Ukunda

items.name: Diani Kids' Ranch
items.short_description: Kids can enjoy pony rides, feed goats, and participate in daily farm chores, fostering a love for nature and animals.
items.address: Off Diani Beach Road, near Kongo Mosque, Ukunda

items.name: Shamba La Watoto (Children's Farm)
items.short_description: A unique cultural farm experience where children learn traditional farming methods and interact with indigenous livestock.
items.address: Ukunda-Msambweni Road, Ukunda

items.name: Coconut Grove Petting Farm
items.short_description: Set amidst a coconut plantation, this farm offers serene animal encounters and eco-friendly activities.
items.address: Galu Kinondo Road, near Alfajiri Villas, Ukunda

items.name: Ukunda Mini Zoo
items.short_description: A small, intimate zoo featuring local and exotic small animals, with educational talks and feeding sessions.
items.address: Diani Beach Road, near Diani Shopping Centre, Ukunda

items.name: Diani Wildlife Encounter
items.short_description: A sanctuary focused on animal rescue and rehabilitation, offering supervised interactions with gentle creatures.
items.address: Off Ukunda-Lungalunga Road, 3km from Ukunda Town, Ukunda

items.name: Coastal Critter Corner
items.short_description: A petting zoo dedicated to local coastal species, providing a fun and informative experience for kids.
items.address: Galu Kinondo Road, near Kinondo Village, Ukunda

items.name: Safari Petting Oasis
items.short_description: An open-air petting zoo where children can safely interact with a variety of tame animals in a natural setting.
items.address: Ukunda-Msambweni Road, near Mwabungo, Ukunda

items.name: Ukunda Funfair Rides
items.short_description: Classic funfair rides including a carousel, mini Ferris wheel, and bouncy castles for endless family entertainment.
items.address: Diani Beach Road, next to Nakumatt Diani, Ukunda

items.name: Diani Beach Thrills
items.short_description: A collection of exciting rides designed for older kids and teens, from spinning teacups to a small roller coaster.
items.address: Off Diani Beach Road, near Forty Thieves, Ukunda

items.name: Safari Adventure Spins
items.short_description: Safari-themed rides that take children on gentle spins and turns, mimicking a mini-adventure through the bush.
items.address: Ukunda-Lungalunga Road, near Ukunda Airstrip, Ukunda

items.name: Kite Riders Coaster
items.short_description: A unique, beach-inspired mini-coaster where kids can 'kite surf' through gentle drops and turns.
items.address: Galu Kinondo Road, near Che Shale, Ukunda

items.name: Ukunda Splash & Play
items.short_description: A vibrant water park featuring small slides, splash pads, and shallow pools perfect for toddlers and young children.
items.address: Diani Beach Road, adjacent to Alliance Hotel, Ukunda

items.name: Diani Aqua Kids Zone
items.short_description: Larger water slides, interactive water features, and a dedicated lazy river section for older children and families.
items.address: Off Ukunda-Lungalunga Road, near Diani Hospital, Ukunda

items.name: Coastal Waves Water Park
items.short_description: Enjoy miniature wave pools and pirate ship themed play areas, offering hours of aquatic fun.
items.address: Galu Kinondo Road, near Lantana Galu Beach, Ukunda

items.name: Blue Lagoon Splash Pad
items.short_description: A delightful splash pad with fountains, sprinklers, and water jets, perfect for cooling off on hot Diani days.
items.address: Ukunda Town Centre, next to Posta, Ukunda

items.name: Ukunda Junior Sports Park
items.short_description: Multi-sport facility with mini football pitches, basketball courts, and track and field areas for young athletes.
items.address: Diani Beach Road, near Diani Reef Resort, Ukunda

items.name: Diani Active Kids Arena
items.short_description: An indoor/outdoor sports complex offering mini-golf, tennis courts, and soft play areas for active fun.
items.address: Off Ukunda-Lungalunga Road, near Safaricom Shop, Ukunda

items.name: Safari Young Champs Hub
items.short_description: Safari-themed obstacle courses, climbing walls, and team-building challenges designed for adventurous kids.
items.address: Galu Kinondo Road, near Neptune Village, Ukunda

items.name: Coastal Kids Multi-Sport
items.short_description: A diverse arena offering beach volleyball, mini-hockey, and agility courses with professional coaching available.
items.address: Ukunda Beach Access Road, near local markets, Ukunda

items.name: Ukunda Safari Land
items.short_description: A mini theme park with safari-themed rides, interactive exhibits, and character meet-and-greets.
items.address: Ukunda-Lungalunga Road, 10km from Ukunda Airport, Ukunda

items.name: Diani Explorer's Village
items.short_description: An educational theme park focusing on coastal ecology and marine life, with gentle rides and discovery zones.
items.address: Diani Beach Road, near Marine Park entrance, Ukunda

items.name: Coastal Adventures Park
items.short_description: A park designed for younger adventurers, featuring small ziplines, climbing structures, and obstacle courses.
items.address: Galu Kinondo Road, near AfroChic Diani, Ukunda

items.name: Jungle Journey Theme Park
items.short_description: Immerse in a lush jungle setting with animatronic animals, hidden pathways, and child-friendly train rides.
items.address: Ukunda Town Centre, next to Ukunda Public Library, Ukunda

items.name: Ukunda Dino Discovery
items.short_description: Walk among life-sized dinosaur models, dig for fossils, and learn about prehistoric life in an immersive setting.
items.address: Ukunda-Lungalunga Road, near Kongo River, Ukunda

items.name: Diani Jurassic Kids
items.short_description: An interactive dinosaur park with animatronic dinosaurs, a paleontology sandbox, and educational presentations.
items.address: Diani Beach Road, 2km from Ukunda Airport, Ukunda

items.name: Coastal Prehistoric Park
items.short_description: Explore a unique park combining dinosaur exhibits with elements of ancient coastal ecosystems, including a dino-themed play area.
items.address: Galu Kinondo Road, near The Maji Beach Boutique, Ukunda

items.name: Raptor Ridge Roar
items.short_description: A thrilling dinosaur adventure featuring sound and motion effects, a raptor encounter maze, and fossil displays.
items.address: Ukunda Town Centre, next to Ukunda Police Station, Ukunda

items.name: Ukunda Safari Quest
items.short_description: Embark on an interactive treasure hunt through a simulated safari environment, solving riddles and completing challenges.
items.address: Diani Beach Road, near Southern Palms Beach Resort, Ukunda

items.name: Diani Treasure Hunt Trails
items.short_description: Outdoor adventure game where teams follow clues across Diani's natural landscapes to find hidden treasures.
items.address: Off Diani Beach Road, near Colobus Conservation, Ukunda

items.name: Coastal Kid's Labyrinth
items.short_description: A fun and challenging maze constructed with natural materials, designed for children to navigate and discover hidden surprises.
items.address: Galu Kinondo Road, near Pinewood Beach Resort, Ukunda

items.name: Jungle Explorer's Challenge
items.short_description: A series of physical and mental challenges set in a jungle-themed adventure park, promoting problem-solving skills.
items.address: Ukunda-Msambweni Road, near Mwabungo Forest, Ukunda
